file_content.text: My lord, we've entered orbit over Ziost.
The Republic invaders have seized Ziost's planetary defense grid. They're disintegrating every vessel that approaches!
Is there a weakness we can exploit to reach the surface?
The Hand's prepared a shuttle for you at Ziost's orbital station. It's small enough to slip through undetected.
The Republic blocks us from landing reinforcements. No wonder the invaders have held out so long.
Tell Servant One to prepare me an alternate approach.
No doubt they'll deactivate the grid once the Republic fleet arrives.
Unlikely, my lord. The Imperium Pride attempted to land; its wreckage now litters the planet.
The shuttle will drop you far from civilization, at Outpost Fury. The Hand's agent already awaits your arrival.
Trying to get us killed, Quinn?
